definition:
A module $P$ is [*projective*]{} if it satisfies the following
equivalent conditions:

\(a) Every short exact sequence of the form $0 \to A \to B \to P \to 0$
is ;

\(b) The functor ${\rm Hom}(P, -)$ is ;

\(c) If $f : X \to Y$ is an epimorphism and there exists a homomorphism
$g : P \to Y$, then there exists a homomorphism $h : P \to X$ such that
$fh = g$. $$\xymatrix{
  &
  P
        \ar@{-->}[dl]_h
        \ar[d]^g
  \\
  X
        \ar[r]_f
  &
  Y
        \ar[r]
  &
  0
}$$

\(d) The module $P$ is a direct summand of a free module.
